pr_title: DHFPROD-4381: Move slider to curate match

timeline.message:
DHFPROD-4381: Move slider to curate match

Also use @marklogic/react-compound-slider, a modified version of the library that supports labeled, crossing handles.

timeline.bodyText: We want the code on the left, not on the right.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: Same thing for this and the chunk below - need the code on the left, not the right.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.bodyText: This one is still incorrect - "adminHubConfig" was removed on 5.4-develop and replaced with "getHubConfig()".
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: @rjrudin fixed and pushed this additional one, please review.
replies.author: wooldridge
